notes:
##  ...................................... Round 1 .......................................

---

### ⚡ Powers:

- We no longer take [Deep Pockets](item_4e5d5d1d-2c0d-4f5e-9521-9f71bdb88e9e) after its nerf. 25% ammo back is 3 ammo back which is insignificant compared to  [Seekerpoint](item_7174fb2f-38d3-48d4-8705-5d90ac72876e) now. We take [Seekerpoint](item_7174fb2f-38d3-48d4-8705-5d90ac72876e) this first round to try and snowball some kills early on.

---

### 💣 Items:

- The best items for Round 1 are Survival items. So we'll buy [Armored Vest](item_358361e2-59be-4c81-b221-8a87f37809e6) for our 1v1 duels.

- Next its pretty obvious. We only do Weapon Power damage so more %WP with [Compensator](item_2a354f80-610c-4661-9bdd-8960ae1a60b0) 

- And since healing ourselves also gives us money, we'll take [Plasma Converter](item_25869f9a-9a29-4e19-96b6-9d8a28c59318).

---

### 🎮 Playstyle:

- Your primary objective is to earn money. You want to farm cash shooting their tank while you look for oportunities to updraft into a quick kill on their backlines. You should play like Freja in normal overwatch, its not until next round that we start becoming a real meneace.

---

### ⚙️ Optionals:

- If its a good map for [Adrenaline Shot](item_ab8eba6a-0bda-4b12-8854-4ba4169b515f) then use that instead of [Armored Vest](item_358361e2-59be-4c81-b221-8a87f37809e6).

- If you are a good player [Heartbeat Sensor](item_2a4ffaf4-f14b-47d2-a267-0a0e83e87418) will be best for you instead of [Armored Vest](item_358361e2-59be-4c81-b221-8a87f37809e6). It'll enhance your already good aim with x-ray vision from time to time.

##  ...................................... Round 2 ......................................

 ---

### 💣 Items:

- Freja is BROKEN in Stadium and its thanks to [Ironclad Exhaust Ports](item_2d085fa5-ace6-4fab-9323-b7a06268bcd0). From round 2 onwards you are [TITLE CARD]. Every time you use an ability you will get 25 Overhealth! Thats INSANE on 3 abilities with 2 of them having short CD and all of them being mobility!

-  Next, we buy [Tourniquet](item_f457a404-70c1-4f1b-b6da-8fa2e90aad54). It pairs SUPER well with  [Ironclad Exhaust Ports](item_2d085fa5-ace6-4fab-9323-b7a06268bcd0) and with your Power   [Deep Pockets](item_4e5d5d1d-2c0d-4f5e-9521-9f71bdb88e9e) 

- The most impactful commons this early in the match are survival items that give 25 hp. So we'll spend the rest of our cash in those. 50 hp on Round 2 is the difference between winning duels or not, and between being able to flank effectively or not.

---

### 🎮 Playstyle:

- Keep farming money by dealing damage to whoever gets close first. And try to get side angles where you can annoy their backline in private.

---

### ⚙️ Optionals:
 
- Any extra money should go towards Survival commons. Try to use all your money though, if you have to buy a $1000 item or two to use all your money then do that, even if they are not survival. (5% WP & 10% Lifesteal are your best $1000 items for that).

- If its a good map for [Adrenaline Shot](item_ab8eba6a-0bda-4b12-8854-4ba4169b515f) then use that instead of [First Aid Kit](item_0172eaaa-1902-44a3-b989-d12f0f7301da).

##  ...................................... Round 3 ......................................

---

### ⚡ Powers:

- On 3rd we take [Redux](item_e27dc8d9-4fa9-4e55-bf9a-7a4b3532a0d8). It goes insanely well with [Seekerpoint](item_7174fb2f-38d3-48d4-8705-5d90ac72876e), it makes you more mobile, improves your DPS and your Survivability (thanks to your rare survival items). It's PERFECT!!!

---

### 💣 Items:

- TL;DR: We now build raw %WP. So [Compensator](item_2a354f80-610c-4661-9bdd-8960ae1a60b0) and [Talon Modification Module](item_c0ca1795-a3ea-4dc9-ae17-f34122574b3a).

- UPDATE: Initially the build used to abuse [Lille Fælde](item_d92c59ae-b2f5-48e5-9f60-66144441eee8) after Round 5, but it got removed, and now nerfed... We were building [Mark of the Kitsune](item_09a53e39-25aa-4f66-ba51-bedbc543a1eb) and  [Three-tap Tommygun](item_39c5d2a4-1db0-444f-86d9-2a1e9a331429) because eventually they paired perfectly into her Bola playstyle for lategame. But its been nerfed to the ground, and some of you pointed out the efficiency of raw %WP. I've done some testings and this new path deals more damage for less money. For now, we'll just optimize %WP so [Compensator](item_2a354f80-610c-4661-9bdd-8960ae1a60b0) and [Talon Modification Module](item_c0ca1795-a3ea-4dc9-ae17-f34122574b3a) are a must. And then you can get anything you want.

---

### 🎮 Playstyle:

- You should have enough damage and survivability now to justify infiltrating to their backlines and annoying the enemy team. You can LITERALLY "one-shot" people with a single right-click and 1 or 2 left-clicks (more like a one-combo kill than one-shot but you get the point).

---

### ⚙️ Optionals:

- If you dont have enough money for all the items shown, prioritize getting [Compensator](item_2a354f80-610c-4661-9bdd-8960ae1a60b0) and [Talon Modification Module](item_c0ca1795-a3ea-4dc9-ae17-f34122574b3a) over anything else (without selling your Survival Rares, of course).

##  ...................................... Round 4 ......................................

 ---

### 💣 Items:

- UPDATE: We are still tanky enough to outplay other DPS at this stage so we will keep focusing on our damage output. Thus, we sell [Tracker Tag](item_509c1491-5431-472d-9ad0-ad69260504a6) to afford [Eye of the Spider](item_bbaf01d7-340d-4199-b738-86a98d68fe9b). If you can buy it without selling anything then do so.

---

### 🎮 Playstyle:

- Not much changes so i'll give a tip instead. If you briefly hold right-click and quickly release right after a dash or updraft, you will go further/higher than normal.

---

### ⚙️ Optionals:

- If you dont have enough money for [Eye of the Spider](item_bbaf01d7-340d-4199-b738-86a98d68fe9b) then [Hardlight Accelerator](item_0390c8af-2a68-4da2-b876-93da32c3f448) can be a replacement for now.

##  ...................................... Round 5 ......................................

---

### ⚡ Powers:

- We take [Forager](item_154b7e20-60fd-4256-bbdd-b19df9a83c9e) now that it got buffed. It'll make us independant of our healers, goes well with our defensive items.

---

### 💣 Items:

- UPDATE: Funnily enough, this late into the game people have enough health to make  [Three-tap Tommygun](item_39c5d2a4-1db0-444f-86d9-2a1e9a331429) the item to add the most damage to our combos. 9% HP guaranteed thanks to  [Seekerpoint](item_7174fb2f-38d3-48d4-8705-5d90ac72876e) as long as we use an ability is insanely good! We currently have 350 hp, assuming others have a same-ish ammount of max hp  [Three-tap Tommygun](item_39c5d2a4-1db0-444f-86d9-2a1e9a331429) would be dealing 32 extra damage. That's 264 vs 257 against 15% WP, proving its the better option now.

---

### 🎮 Playstyle:

- You gotta shoot A LOT after your right clicks. Don't worry, every arrow you hit refunds the ammo so you have infinite ammo as long as you keep hitting your left-clicks while they have a right-click arrow stuck on them. Be mindful of this and spam your left click as much as you can, each shot that you hit gives you 5% CDR / 4% HP / 1 ammo, so it's very important that you start spamming left clicks a lot after your right-clicks if you weren't already!

---

### ⚙️ Optionals:

- If you lack money, you can go for [Icy Coolant](item_8b1c21e9-33e8-49a6-8277-a3a06d55a65f) instead.

- If you are rich you can buy [Toxin Tips](item_37a11564-aef7-4e13-83de-1a4b949cd28d) (for reasons explained at Round 6's Notes).

##  ...................................... Round 6 ......................................

 ---

### 💣 Items:

- We take [Hardlight Accelerator](item_0390c8af-2a68-4da2-b876-93da32c3f448) to continue down the one-shotting path.

---

### 🎮 Playstyle:

- By now, you should be basically immortal and as deadly as a Grim Reaper. Go to the enemy backlines and kill them one by one, make them follow you and isolate them from their own team to kill them in a 1v1.

---

### ⚙️ Optionals:

- If healers are the main problem you can take [El-sa'ka Supressor](item_b4298dd9-9b93-461f-a2e0-843402667100) instead. This way we don't give them a bigger window to save their allies and instead, we'll reduce their healing output.

- If you can sell [Talon Modification Module](item_c0ca1795-a3ea-4dc9-ae17-f34122574b3a) to buy [Codebreaker](item_caa96c7e-655f-4d03-9bd9-0f41937fec27) then do so.

##  ...................................... Round 7 ......................................

---

### ⚡ Powers:

- This late into the game, many people would have built some Survival items. We need some extra burst to deal with them and [Thread the Needle](item_baaae2d6-b4aa-465d-afc9-4b083d1530f7) will sometimes give you an extra explosion on the ground against the same target if you hit them from above dealing 109 extra damage, enough to burst a 400 hp target, which is what enemy "squishies" now have.

---

### 💣 Items:

- We'll keep [Eye of the Spider](item_bbaf01d7-340d-4199-b738-86a98d68fe9b), [Three-tap Tommygun](item_39c5d2a4-1db0-444f-86d9-2a1e9a331429) and [Hardlight Accelerator](item_0390c8af-2a68-4da2-b876-93da32c3f448) because they are core to our build.

- We'll sell our Rare Survival items to buy [Overdrive Core](item_a2a8dba1-5f2f-4da1-9445-b08f49162121) and [Vanadium Injection](item_57953fbc-11ff-4e92-9928-fc59b7be668f). Stadium gives you hp when you spend money, this way we maximize it while building %WP and survival, all in one.

- We'll buy [Mark of the Kitsune](item_09a53e39-25aa-4f66-ba51-bedbc543a1eb) who will add 30~90 damage to our combos.

---

### 🎮 Playstyle:

- Its the last round, try to analyze who is their most important player and focus them heavily. 

- Because you bought [Vanadium Injection](item_57953fbc-11ff-4e92-9928-fc59b7be668f) you want to hold your ult and not use it unless it's for a combo with Zarya ult or something gamewinning.

- YOU NEED TO PLAY MORE PASSIVELY!!! Late game builds such as %WP Soldier and Orbs Moira will outscale you on this last round, so be careful not to get bursted and PLAY SAFE! (You also traded your best survival items to try and stay competitive with your damage output, you are not squishy but you are not tanky anymore.)

- Try to hit single people from above so [Thread the Needle](item_baaae2d6-b4aa-465d-afc9-4b083d1530f7) triggers an explosion on the ground beneath them, and try to look for chokes where you can spam your right-clicks to pierce through multiple enemies!

- And Communicate with your team and coordinate your pushes so that this last round you end up victorious!

---

### ⚙️ Optionals:

-  [El-sa'ka Supressor](item_b4298dd9-9b93-461f-a2e0-843402667100) is very valuable on the late-game to counter immortal builds like [Orisa](hero_91644d44-1093-4f62-ac51-020975465e85) or insane healers like [Mercy](hero_0e213bfc-3ca9-49c6-9036-e7f344b752da) and [Moira](hero_7fb6ff1e-a193-40c0-bd0a-25c1928fbaed).

-  [Aerial Distresser](item_0fcb9020-c729-49b9-b398-3223797b6204) if you need to kill Mercy or Juno.
